doc.title: (Calcutta) GO
doc.plot: An Indian, when walking, never stops. An obstacle only makes him change direction. To go is like the flow of life itself, ugly as it may be. Calcutta, once one of the most beautiful cities in the world, is now one of the saddest and poorest ones. Its traffic is hell. But still, it flows.

An Indian, when walking, never stops. An obstacle only makes him change direction. To go is like the flow of life itself, ugly as it may be. Calcutta, once one of the most beautiful cities in the world, is now one of the saddest and poorest ones. Its traffic is hell. But still, it flows.
